name: DrawingGame
0:
”Alexa, open Drawing Game”
”Alexa, start Drawing Game”
”Alexa, play Drawing Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drawing game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Uh oh! Our favorite robot forgot the names of certain pictures. Families play together by drawing pictures to help our robot remember pictures (and gain practice using writing tools) in a fun, engaging way.

The Drawing Game has 3 levels: Easy, Medium, and Hard.

For more screen-less, play-based learning, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. By combining voice technology and real-world, tangible play, we help educators and families learn together in a safe, natural, and engaging way - without screens!

If you found the skill helpful, we greatly appreciate reviews!

Awards
- SayKid wins Grand Prize in the 2020 Alexa EdTech Competition 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Competition
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize at US Bank Stadium
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
